text: The 1919 New York Giants season was the franchise's 37th season. The team finished in second place in the National League with an 87-53 record, 9 games behind the Cincinnati Reds. == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Notable transactions === * May 21, 1919: Jim Thorpe was traded by the Giants to the Boston Braves for Pat Ragan.Jim Thorpe page at Baseball Reference === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font- size: 95%;" |- !
